title: How to Cook Karen Porridge

steps.headline: Prepare a cup of rice.
steps.description: The amount of rice or cereal is optional.

steps.headline: Soak the rice in pure water for 10 or 20 minutes.
steps.description: The longer you soak it, the easier you will find it is to grind or pound it.

steps.headline: Remove the rice from the water.
steps.description: Grind it in a machine or pound it with a mortar and pestle.

steps.headline: Start boiling the ground or crushed rice: Stir it constantly
While the boiling the rice, prepare the following ingredients for adding to the porridge: Lemongrass, garlic, salt, chopped raw bamboo shoots, small amount of fish paste, any kind of meat (optional).
When the rice is cooked, pour chopped raw bamboo shoots into the pot.
Cook for another 30 minutes until the bamboo shoots are cooked.
steps.description: When ready,the color of bamboo shoots will turn to yellow.

steps.headline: Add the ground or crushed garlic, lemongrass, desired amount of salt and fish paste to the pot.
Stir the porridge.
steps.description: Taste whether it is salty enough or not (add more if you want to).

steps.headline: Wait 2 minutes and then add the meat (if using).
Stir the porridge again and wait until the meat is cooked.
Done.
steps.description: The Karen porridge is ready to serve.
